TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public MustInherit Class AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute abstract : Attribute

summary.span: 为报告附加属性使用范围的 .NET 特性提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for .NET attributes that report the use scope of attached properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `browsable`本 .NET Framework 特性 (和派生类) 的说明中使用的术语的含义类似于提供的说明 ，但附加属性的可浏览状态特别与 EXTENSIBLE APPLICATION MARKUP LANGUAGE (xaml) 的属性信息相关，因为附加属性主要是 XAML 概念。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this .NET Framework attribute (and derived classes) is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML), because an attached property is primarily a XAML concept.
